nodes.description: 2019年9月2日，塔利班在喀布尔国际组织住宅区发动拖拉机炸弹袭击，造成16人死亡119人受伤，包括5名尼泊尔人、2名英国人和1名罗马尼亚外交官
nodes.support_text: On the evening of 2 September 2019, a bomb on a tractor killed 16 people and injured 119 others at a housing compound used by international organisations in Kabul, Afghanistan.

nodes.description: 2019年9月5日，塔利班在喀布尔市中心安全区域实施自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，导致12人死亡40余人受伤，包括1名美国士兵和1名罗马尼亚士兵
nodes.support_text: On 5 September 2019, at least 12 people, including an American service member and a Romanian soldier, were killed and more than 40 injured when a suicide car bomber exploded in a heavily fortified area of central Kabul, close to the Afghan security offices.

nodes.description: 2019年9月2日和5日，塔利班声称对喀布尔两次袭击负责
nodes.support_text: The Taliban claimed responsibility for the attacks.

edges.support_text: The Taliban claimed responsibility for the attacks.
根据时间线，声称责任发生在第一次袭击（node_1）之后
根据时间线，声称责任发生在第二次袭击（node_2）之后
